GSD.product_version: versions from v3.11 to before v4.14.291
GSD.description:
drm/radeon: fix potential buffer overflow in ni_set_mc_special_registers()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.14.291 by commit ea73869df6ef386fc0feeb28ff66742ca835b18f, it was introduced in version v3.11 by commit 69e0b57a91adca2e3eb56ed4db39ab90f3ae1043. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: drm/radeon: fix potential buffer overflow in ni_set_mc_special_registers()
